H3.text: In which Thomas Hardy novel does Michael Henchard appear. Henchard

A4.text: The Mayor of Casterbridge: The Life and Death of a Man of Character is an 1886 novel by the English author Thomas Hardy.

A5.text: Michael Henchard, a 21-year-old hay-trusser, argues with his wife Susan at a country fair at Weydon Priors in Wessex.
